alert.note: Alert for Clearfield; Elk (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:46PM EDT until July 24 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Elk County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Penfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Penfield, Force, Benezette, Parker Dam State Park, Medix Run, Hicks Run and Weedville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
